text: as happened? That information has not been available on Earth or accessible to Earth humans for five million years!” My personality did not know, but my soul-self understood that “something big had happened.” Then Charleamea telepathi- cally whispered in my mind. “ The Arc Has Sparked, ” Charleamea again repeated. “The seal on the Arc has released, the Arc of the Covenant has opened.” Suddenly the memory stopped racing through my mind and my sense of expanded consciousness “pulled in” a little. I felt a huge quantity of electrical data being pulled into my auric field and knew the Keylontic transmission was ready for translation. As the experience ended I was awestruck with what had just passed through 236
